paragraph 2: The movements in tangible fixed assets and vessels under construction are reported in the following table:
paragraph 3: Vessels with an aggregate carrying amount of $4,407,156 as of December 31, 2019 (December 31, 2018: $4,304,252) have been pledged as collateral under the terms of the Group’s loan agreements (Note 13).
